Interface CarSpecification

All Known Implementing Classes:
CarSpecificationImpl
@Component public interface CarSpecification
Interface for dynamic filtering of car entities based on specified criteria.

This interface provides a method for creating a Specification that can be used to filter car entities based on various fields such as brand, model, price, speed, and components.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<CarEntity>
    dynamicFilters(CarCriterionFilteringView criterionFilteringView)
    Creates a Specification for filtering car entities based on the given criteria.

  • Method Details

    • dynamicFilters

      org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<CarEntity> dynamicFilters(CarCriterionFilteringView criterionFilteringView)
      Creates a Specification for filtering car entities based on the given criteria.

      This method allows dynamic filtering based on multiple criteria, such as brand, model, color, price range, speed range, and components. The filters are applied only if the respective values are provided in the input object.

      Parameters:
      criterionFilteringView - the filtering criteria containing the values to filter by.
      Returns:
      a Specification that can be used to filter car entities.
